commit message: Initial commit
partial implementation of the API and basic user interface
Added features : resize and snapshot
Added features : restore and rebuild droplet
Added features connect to a droplet via an ssh client
Added features : enable and disable backups
Added features : Create domain
Added README.md
Fixed potential illegalstateexception and memory leak. added basic support for domain records
Fixed a potential crash. and added icon for images that no longer available.
Added ability to delete domains and better formatting for domains' details
Added the ability to synchronize the data in the background
Fixed app crash after adding a droplet. Added the ability to move the application to SD card.
Added the ability to scrub (or not) the data when destroying a droplet.
Added the ability to add domain records.
Better support for viewing domain records.
Fixed UI issues for small screens. Minor bugs.
Added support for : Froyo, Gingerbread and Honeycomb
Sorted images alphabetically and separated by type.
Added the ability to enable backup when creating the droplet
Added ads when leaving the app
Added : application rating request
Added the ability to edit and destroy domain records
Added the ability to disable/limit ads.
Added SSH Keys support
Added the ability to assign SSH keys to a droplet on creation
Updated README.md
fixed crash on upgrade and hides the ssh key selector if no ssh key is available
Fixed navigation drawer selection for api 11+
Removed ads and updated navigation icons
removed unnecessary slug from the images list view
Preliminary patch to add support for AAAA domain records.
Updated the two auto-generated R.java files after getting D.O. Swimmer to build and testing the AAAA domain record patch.

Merge pull request #3 from modelrockettier/master

Added support for AAAA domain records
Fixed a potential crash and removed unnecessary required permissions.
